properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 12:44PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service in Riverton.

* WHAT...Persistent snow bands drifting south across eastern
Fremont County will gradually diminish between 2 and 3 PM. Areas
east of a line from Pavillion to Ethete to Lander will see
accumulations of 1 to 2 inches with local amounts of 3 inches in
northeast Fremont County.

* WHERE...Eastern Fremont County.

* WHEN...Through 3 PM.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Road conditions will be slick across
portions of northeast Fremont County. Temperatures in the lower
30s will allow for many area roadways to become wet during the
late afternoon hours.

NWSheadline: Snow Gradually Ending this Afternoon in Eastern Fremont County
